Title: The Sweet Hereafter
Actors: Ian Holm, Caerthan Banks, Sarah Polley, Tom McCamus
Plot: A small community is torn apart by a tragic accident which kills most of the town's children. A lawyer visits the victims' parents in order to profit from the tragedy by stirring up the their anger and launching a class action suit against anyone they can blame. The community is paralyzed by its anger and cannot let go. All but one young girl, left in a wheelchair after the accident, who finds the courage to lead the way toward healing.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 33 wins & 54 nominations.
